extensionDescription.message: Adds a button to unsubscribe from newsletters and other bulk email that has the List-Unsubscribe header.

enableContextButtonTitle.description: Title of the option to enable the context button.

enableContextButtonEnable.description: Option to enable the context button.

enableContextButtonDisable.description: Option to disable the context button.

processing.description: A message shown when the extension is processing the message.

noUnsub.description: Shown when no List-Unsubscribe header was found in the message.

unsubLink.description: A visible label for the unsubscribe link.

unsubConfirmPrompt.message: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe from this mailing list?
unsubConfirmPrompt.description: A prompt that asks the user to confirm that they want continue with the one-click unsubscribe.

confirmOneClick.description: A button label to confirm the one-click unsubscribe.

confirmOpenLink.description: A button label to open the unsubscribe link in the browser.

confirmComposeEmail.description: A button label to compose an email to unsubscribe.

oneClickInProgress.description: A message shown when the one-click unsubscribe is pending.

oneClickSuccess.description: A message shown when the one-click unsubscribe was successful.

oneClickFailure.description: A message shown when the one-click unsubscribe failed.
